## bubbles.Bubble.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Bubble` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, anchor: Coordinate, ownerRect?: Rect | undefined, overriddenFocusableElement?: SVGElement | HTMLElement);
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

workspace


</td><td>

[WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md)


</td><td>

The workspace this bubble belongs to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

anchor


</td><td>

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)


</td><td>

The anchor location of the thing this bubble is attached to. The tail of the bubble will point to this location.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

ownerRect


</td><td>

[Rect](./blockly.utils_namespace.rect_class.md) \| undefined


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional rect we don't want the bubble to overlap with when automatically positioning.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

overriddenFocusableElement


</td><td>

SVGElement \| HTMLElement


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional replacement to the focusable element that's represented by this bubble (as a focusable node). This element will have its ID and tabindex overwritten. If not provided, the focusable element of this node will default to the bubble's SVG root.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
